dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.serv.cfs.ServicePackage
dataStructure.description:
A ServicePackage is derived from an associated ServicePackageSpec. The ServicePackageSpec defines the invariant attributes, methods, relationships, and constraints for all ServicePackage instances that are derived from it. This enables each individual ServicePackage to add its own application-specific changeable characteristics and behavior. Note that there is no specific aggregation used to relate a particular ServicePackage to the ServicePackageSpec that it is derived from. This is because the ServicePackageSpec and ServicePackage both inherit the SpecifiesService aggregation, and at this (the business level) view, there are no new semantics that are required to represent this relationship. Finally, while the composite pattern could be applied to ServicePackage, there is no perceived need to do so. Multiple ServicePackages will simply be aggregated by a ProductBundle, and appear as separate ProductComponents.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServicePackage

child.name: serviceBundle
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServicePackageUsesServiceBundles

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceBundle
